CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of the new Code lays down a judicial procedure for the consideration of complaints . Orders of an investigator or prosecutor refusing to institute criminal proceedings or terminate a case , and other orders and acts or omissions which are liable to infringe the constitutional rights and freedoms of the parties to criminal proceedings or to impede a citizen ’s access to justice , may be appealed against to a local district court , which is empowered to check the lawfulness and grounds of the impugned decisions .
